resources.string:
OpenRC is a modified version of the ftc_app software created by members of the OpenFTC community. The goal of OpenRC is to improve the development experience for teams, while providing a quick-and-easy path to install a competition-legal version of the app.


The GDC has ruled that OpenRC is NOT legal for competition use, and the user acknowledged this fact the first time they launched this app. For more information, visit http://openftc.org/OpenRC/legality


For more information about OpenRC and the OpenFTC community responsible for it, please visit http://openftc.org/OpenRC

OpenRC has been ruled ILLEGAL for competition use.


Use Android Studio to switch to the competition-legal stock build variant before going to a competition.


http://openftc.org/OpenRC/legality
Limits scrolling to the vertical axis
